name: Blood Harvest Demo
description:
Rough Draft  project for my Interactive Media class!

 the premise I have so far:

"Six high school seniors plan a graduation camping trip, only  to get stranded near a remote gas station .  A farmer and his wife pick up the teens and take them to their farm. After one of the teens goes missing. they  discover the haunting truths  about the "family."

Game picture is by  Claudia Ramirez ( https://unsplash.com/photos/WrEJJOfuQyE )
